skshapelet.datasets package¶

Submodules¶

skshapelet.datasets.base module¶

skshapelet.datasets.base.get_dist_key(dist, value)[source]¶

A static method to return the key that stored the required value or return -1 if not exist.

Args:
dist: dist

A dist that may contain some key-value pairs.

value: string

The class label.

Returns:
output: int

The integer that stored the associated with the value or returns -1 if not exist.

skshapelet.datasets.base.load_dataset(name, split, return_X_y, dist=None)[source]¶

A static method to load dataset by name. This mirrors the sktime implementation.

Args:
name: string

The name of dataset.

split: string

Whether it belongs to the train or test set or none of them.

return_X_y: bool

Whether should return true or false.

dist: dist, optional

A dist that may contain some key-value pairs.

Returns:

output: ndarray, ndarray, dist

skshapelet.datasets.base.pre_processing(y, dist=None)[source]¶

A static method to pre-process the y.

Args:
y: string

A string that may contain characters or integer.

dist: dist_like, optional

A dist that may contain some key-value pairs.

Returns:
output: ndarray, dist

The numpy array and a dist that have been processed.

Module contents¶

skshapelet.datasets.load_dataset(name, split, return_X_y, dist=None)[source]¶

A static method to load dataset by name. This mirrors the sktime implementation.

Args:
name: string

The name of dataset.

split: string

Whether it belongs to the train or test set or none of them.

return_X_y: bool

Whether should return true or false.

dist: dist, optional

A dist that may contain some key-value pairs.

Returns:

output: ndarray, ndarray, dist
